title: A cucurbit[8]uril based supramolecular assembly and its potential applications for the removal of dye and antibiotic from an aqueous medium
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8161-8166
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00347K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lulu Shi, Lin Wang, Mingchun Li, Mei Liu
A CB[8]-based supramolecular assembly was used as a high efficiency absorbent to remove common use dye amaranth red (AMR) and an antibacterial drug of broad-spectrum sulfadiazine sodium (SFZ) in aqueous solution.
